xwikidoc.title: Polls application localization
xwikidoc.content: ## ## Home page ## ### Missing: polls.home.title=Polls polls.home.create=Pridať hlasovanie polls.index.doc.title=Názov hlasovania polls.index.type=Typ polls.index.from=Začína ### Missing: polls.index.to=Ends ### Missing: polls.index.doc.creator=Launched by polls.index._actions=Akcie ## ## Creation/editing ## polls.create.title=Spustiť nové hlasovanie ## Error messages ### Missing: polls.form.error.missingTitle=The title field is mandatory. polls.form.error.missingOptions=Uveďte prosím aspoň 2 možnosti. ### Missing: polls.form.error.missingQuestion=The poll question is mandatory. ### Missing: polls.form.error.missingVoteType=The vote type is mandatory. ### Missing: polls.form.error.missingRatingLevel=The maximum rating level is mandatory for rating polls, and must be greater than 0 and at most {0}. ### Missing: polls.form.error.missingOpenDate=The poll opening date is mandatory and must have the format {0}. ### Missing: polls.form.error.missingCloseDate=The poll closing date is mandatory and must have the format {0}. ### Missing: polls.form.error.wrongDateOrder=The poll closing date must be after the opening date. ## Section titles ### Missing: polls.form.section.general=What are you polling? polls.form.section.options=Nastavenia ### Missing: polls.form.section.voteType=Vote type ### Missing: polls.form.section.timeline=Timeline ### Missing: polls.form.section.votes=Votes ## Fiels labels polls.form.label.space=Kde\: polls.form.label.title=Názov ### Missing: polls.form.label.allOptions=Enter all options, one on each line ### Missing: polls.form.label.optionCount.multiple=Maximum number of choices ### Missing: polls.form.label.optionCount.multiple.details=multiple choice and weighted multiple choice only polls.form.label.optionCount.separator=alebo ### Missing: polls.form.label.optionCount.rating=Maximum rating level (minimum is 0, the ratings can be from 0 = lowest to this maximum inclusive) polls.form.label.optionCount.rating.details=Len hodnotenie ### Missing: polls.form.label.timeline=Polling period polls.form.label.timeline.dateFormat=(formát dátumu\: {0}) ## Tools polls.form.tools.delete=[odstrániť] polls.form.tools.delete.tooltip=Odstrániť polls.form.tools.move=[posúvať] ### Missing: polls.form.tools.move.tooltip=Drag and drop to change the order polls.form.tools.addOption=Pridať ďalšie možnosti ## Form actions polls.form.actions.create=Vytvoriť hlasovanie polls.form.actions.cancel=Zrušiť ## ## Viewing/voting ## ## Voting instructions polls.vote.instructions.single=Vyberte jednu z možností. ### Missing: polls.vote.instructions.multiple=Choose at least 1 and at most {0} of the options below. ### Missing: polls.vote.instructions.weighted=Assign non-zero percentages to at least 1 and at most {0} of the options below. The sum must be 100%. ### Missing: polls.vote.instructions.rating=Rate from 0 (least favorable) to {0} (most favorable) each one of the options. ### Missing: polls.vote.instructions.ranking.noscript=Use the "move up/move down" tools to reorder the items according to your preference (higher is better). ### Missing: polls.vote.instructions.ranking.script=Drag and drop the items to reorder them according to your preference (higher is better). ## Timeline ### Missing: polls.vote.timeline.notOpen=This poll is not open yet. It will be available from {0} to {1}. polls.vote.timeline.ongoing=Hlasovanie je otvorené od {0} do {1}. polls.vote.timeline.closed=Hlasovanie uzavreté. ## Voting form polls.vote.label.voted=Odpovedali ste\: polls.vote.actions.vote=Odoslať polls.vote.actions.updateVote=Aktualizovať odpoveď ### Missing: polls.vote.actions.cancel=Go to the Polls home page ## Tools polls.vote.tools.moveup=[presunúť hore] polls.vote.tools.moveup.tooltip=Presunúť hore polls.vote.tools.movedown=[posunúť nadol] polls.vote.tools.movedown.tooltip=Posunúť nadol polls.vote.tools.incValue=Zvýšiť hodnotu o 1 polls.vote.tools.decValue=Znižovať hodnotu o 1 ## Error messages ### Missing: polls.vote.warning.unauthorized=You must be logged-in and have proper rights on this document in order to vote. ### Missing: polls.vote.error.single.noneSelected=Please choose one of the options below. ### Missing: polls.vote.error.multiple.noneSelected=Please select at least one option. ### Missing: polls.vote.error.multiple.wrongSelectedNumber=Please choose at least one and at most {0} of the options below. ### Missing: polls.vote.error.weighted.wrongSelectedNumber=Please assign non-zero weights to at most {0} of the options. ### Missing: polls.vote.error.weighted.wrongTotalWeight=Please assign weights that sum up to 100. The sum of your current weight assignments is {0}. ### Missing: polls.vote.error.rating.optionMissing=Please select a rating for each option. ### Missing: polls.vote.error.rating.ratingOutOfRange=Rating out of range for option {0}. ### Missing: polls.vote.error.ranking.unknownElement=Invalid order: unknown element {0}. ### Missing: polls.vote.error.ranking.duplicateElement=Invalid order: duplicate element {0}. ## Results polls.vote.results.title.before= ### Missing: polls.vote.results.title.during=Intermediate results polls.vote.results.title.after=Výsledky ### Missing: polls.vote.results.participants={0} participant{0,choice,0#s|1#|1<s} polls.vote.results.chart.percentage=Percentuálny podiel polls.vote.results.chart.voteCount=Počet hlasov ### Missing: polls.vote.results.chart.columnsNumberWarning=Only the first {0} columns can be displayed in the chart. polls.vote.results.table.option=Možnosť polls.vote.results.table.percentage=Percentuálny podiel polls.vote.results.table.percentageVoters=Percentuálny podiel hlasujúcich polls.vote.results.table.voteCount=Počet hlasov ### Missing: polls.vote.results.table.voters=Chosen by polls.vote.results.table.average=Priemer ## ## Document version log ## ### Missing: polls.versionSummary.pollCreated=Poll created ### Missing: polls.versionSummary.optionAdded=Poll option added polls.versionSummary.userVoted={0} hlasoval ## ## Class translations ## ### Missing: Polls.PollClass_type_single=Single choice Polls.PollClass_type_multiple=Viacero možností ### Missing: Polls.PollClass_type_weighted=Weighted multiple choice Polls.PollClass_type_rating=Hodnotenie Polls.PollClass_type_ranking=Rebríček Polls.PollClass_question=Otázka ### Missing: Polls.PollClass_optionsPerVoter=Maximum number of options per voter ### Missing: Polls.PollClass_type=Choice type Polls.PollClass_from=od Polls.PollClass_to=pre
